ingredients.ingredient: 3 pounds sweet Italian pork sausages, cut into 2-inch pieces
3 medium green peppers, cut into 2-inch long strips
1 (4 pound 4 ounce) jar Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce
12 each Pepperidge Farm® Classic Sandwich Buns with Sesame Seeds, split

cookingTips: Brown sausage pieces in batches to develop proper color without overcrowding
Caramelize onions and peppers separately before combining with sausage for depth
Warm sauce and allow all components to simmer together for 15-20 minutes before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you manage cooking this large quantity while maintaining even browning and flavor?
